settings.editingPresetHint: Editing preset - click Save or Save As to keep changes
settings.streamingPollIntervalDesc: How often to check for new prompts during streaming (lower = faster detection, more CPU usage)
settings.maxConcurrentDesc: Maximum number of images to generate simultaneously (recommended: 1 to limit rate)
settings.minGenerationIntervalDesc: Minimum time delay between consecutive image generation requests, helping prevent rate limiting (0 = no delay)
settings.logLevelDesc: Controls logging verbosity (DEBUG shows detailed monitoring, INFO shows key events, WARN/ERROR minimal)
settings.promptPatternsDesc: Regex patterns to detect image prompts (one per line). Supports multiple formats for backward compatibility.
settings.commonStyleTagsDesc: Comma-separated tags to add to all image generation prompts. These tags will be deduplicated with prompt-specific tags.
settings.manualGenerationModeDesc: Default mode for manual image generation and regeneration dialogs
settings.showProgressWidgetDesc: Display the progress widget that shows generation status and completed images
settings.showGalleryWidgetDesc: Display the gallery widget that shows all images in the current chat
settings.showStreamingPreviewWidgetDesc: Display the streaming preview widget that shows real-time text and image placeholders during generation
settings.imageDisplayWidthDesc: Control the display width of generated images in chat (10-100%). Changes apply to all images immediately.
settings.validationSuccess: ✅ Detection patterns can find image generation prompts in meta prompt
settings.validationWarning: ⚠️ Warning: Detection patterns cannot find any image generation prompts in the current meta prompt. This may indicate a mismatch.
settings.validationHint: The regex patterns should match the format used in your meta prompt template.
dialog.foundPrompts: Found {count} image generation prompt(s) in this message.
dialog.foundPromptsPlural: Found {count} image generation prompts in this message.
dialog.howToGenerate: How would you like to generate images?
dialog.replaceDesc: Remove existing images and regenerate new ones
dialog.appendDesc: Keep existing images and add new ones after them
dialog.whatToDo: What would you like to do with this image?
dialog.appendRegen: Keep and add new image after it
dialog.userFeedback: What changes do you want to make?
dialog.feedbackPlaceholder: e.g., 'Make the background more detailed' or 'Change the lighting to golden hour'
dialog.promptUpdatedRegenerate: Prompt updated successfully! Would you like to regenerate the image with the new prompt?
dialog.promptUpdatedRegenerateWithMode: Prompt updated successfully! How would you like to regenerate the image?
toast.noPromptsFound: No image generation prompts found in message
toast.streamingFailed: {count} image(s) failed to generate during streaming
toast.streamingNoPrompts: No image generation prompts detected during streaming
toast.promptNotFoundForImage: Could not find prompt for this image
toast.cannotUsePredefinedNames: Cannot use predefined preset names (Default, NAI 4.5 Full)
toast.cannotGenerateWhileStreaming: Cannot generate images while streaming is in progress, please wait for current message to complete
toast.cannotGenerateMessageStreaming: Cannot generate images for this message: streaming is active
toast.cannotManualWhileStreaming: Cannot perform this operation while streaming is active for this message
toast.valueAdjusted: Value adjusted from {original} to {clamped} (valid range: {min}-{max}, step: {step})
toast.feedbackRequired: Please provide feedback for the prompt update
toast.cannotUpdateDuringGeneration: Cannot update prompt while images are being generated for this message
toast.reloadRequired: Please reload the page for this change to take effect
progress.clickToView: Click to view • ESC to close
modal.openedForSaving: Image opened - long press to save
gallery.title: Image Gallery
gallery.noImages: No images found in this chat
gallery.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this image? This action cannot be undone!
settings.promptGenerationModeDesc: Controls how image prompts are generated
settings.promptGenerationModeSharedDesc: AI embeds prompts in main response (faster, no extra API cost)
settings.promptGenerationModeIndependent: Separate API call after response (cleaner AI responses, +1 API call per message)
settings.maxPromptsPerMessageDesc: Cost control: limits prompts when using independent API generation (1-30)
settings.contextMessageCountDesc: Number of previous messages to include as context for prompt generation (0-50)
settings.metaPromptDepthDesc: Position to insert meta prompt in chat history (0 = last message, 1 = one before last, etc.)
settings.llmFrequencyGuidelinesDesc: When should the AI generate image prompts? (e.g., every 250 words, at scene changes)
settings.llmPromptWritingGuidelinesDesc: How should the AI write image prompts? (tag structure, quality tags, style)
toast.llmPromptGenerationFailed: Failed to generate image prompts using independent API
streamingPreview.title: Live Preview
